server module¶

server.contrast_stretched_upload(username, filepath)¶
Performs contrast stretching/encoding and uploads to database along

with associated data metrics (upload time, processing time, histogram, size).

Parameters

  • username (str) – username to upload to in database

  • filepath (str) – filepath of image to be processed and encoded

Returns

None

server.fetch_image(id, name)¶
GET request. Given the user id and the image name, return the image

file.

Parameters

  • id (str) – user id in the database

  • name (str) – name of the file to find image file of

Returns

contains metrics info in list Status code: indicate whether request is successful

Return type

JSON

  • item is list of image files. (Second) –

the image file encoded in base64

server.original_upload(username, filepath)¶
Performs encoding and uploads to database along with associated data

metrics (upload time, processing time, histogram, size). Checks to see if username is already associated with a UserData document and uploads accordingly.

Parameters

  • username (str) – username to upload to in database

  • filepath (str) – filepath of image to be processed and encoded

Returns

server.upload_images()¶
POST request to process and upload images to the database. Receives

the username associated with the request, the list of images to be processed, and the processing type. Calls the appropriate processing pathways.

Parameters

None –

Returns

Str indicating successful upload.

Return type

JSON

Returns

dict
